```{r}
#Load packages

library(tidyverse)

#Load data

enroll <- read_csv("grad enrollment edited.csv")

```

```{r, warning = FALSE}
#Visualize the trends in the raw data

enroll_graph <- ggplot(enroll, aes(x = year)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = total_males, color = "total_males")) +
  geom_line(aes(y = total_females, color = "total_females"))
  
enroll_graph  
  
  
  
```
